self_predictions.prediction_summary: Rustam feels confident in his current form, stating his arm is stronger than before and his chest is healed. He believes if his chest holds up during the match, he will be in his best shape.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Inside arm wrestling with focus on hand strength and technical prowess.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Rustam believes John Brzenk is the best arm wrestler ever and will out-arm wrestle Leonidas due to his experience and technical skills.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Experience vs. new player in the game.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Rustam thinks if Kurdecha brings good form, he may win early rounds, but Jerry has endurance advantage if the match goes long.
Rustam believes Todd Hutchings is gaining momentum and if Prudnik is underprepared, Todd has a good chance.

Paul Linn.strength: Strong inside arm wrestler with technical prowess.
Paul Linn.previous_match_summary: Previous match was tough, but Rustam feels he can win this time.

John Brzenk.strength: Greatest arm wrestler ever with unmatched experience.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Paul feels good about his preparation and is thankful for the opportunity to run the match back. He acknowledges Rustam's strength and technical skills.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Inside arm wrestling with focus on hand strength and setup.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Paul believes John will find a way to out-arm wrestle Leonidas due to his experience and control over pronation.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Experience vs. new player in the game.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Paul thinks Jerry has an edge if the match goes into deep water due to his endurance and experience in long wars.
Paul believes Travis's experience and smart setup will give him an edge over Corey's physical strength.
Paul thinks Dave's side pressure and size will be tough for Frank to handle, especially if Dave is close to his past form.

Rustam Babaiev.strength: Pinnacle of inside arm wrestling with strong hand and wrist.
Rustam Babaiev.previous_match_summary: Previous match was tough, but Rustam is confident now.

Travis Bagent.previous_match_summary: Experienced and confident with left arm.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin thinks Michael's shoulder roll and mobility could give him an edge if he avoids the King's move.
Engin believes Elizabeth has learned from her first experience and is now stronger, predicting a comfortable win.

Michael Todd.strength: Strong with shoulder roll and mobility.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Paolo believes Janis is a better arm wrestler and gives him a 60-40 edge over Justin.
Paolo thinks Mindaugas has more experience and will find a way to prevent Artem from using his unorthodox style.
third_party_predictions.predicted_duration: Huge war if Artem gets his position.
